template <typename LP>
struct vsip::impl::Applied_layout
File: ../../../vsip/core/layout.hpp

Applied_layout takes the layout policies encapsulated by a Layout and applys them to map multi-dimensional indices into memory offsets.

Specializations:
Applied_layout<Layout<*,Order,Stride_unit_dense,ComplexLayout>>
Applied_layout<Layout<*,Order,Stride_unit_align<Align>,ComplexLayout>>
Applied_layout<Layout<*,Order,Stride_unit,ComplexLayout>>

Applied_layout<Layout<*,tuple<*,*,*>,Stride_unit_align<Align>,ComplexLayout>>
Applied_layout<Layout<*,tuple<Dim0,Dim1,Dim2>,Stride_unit_dense,ComplexLayout>>
